original_title: FLOSS Weekly Episode 803: Unconferencing with OggCamp
original_content:
This week Jonathan Bennett and and Simon Phipps chat with Gary Williams about OggCamp! Its the Free Software and Free culture unconference happening soon in Manchester! What exactly is an unconference? How long has OggCamp been around, and what should you expect to see there? Listen to find out!


https://ogg.camp


Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show Right on our YouTube Channel? Have someone youd like us to interview? Let us know, or contact the guest and have them contact us! Take a look at the schedule here.

Direct Download in DRM-free MP3.
If youd rather read along, heres the transcript for this weeks episode.
